document_data.name: Theskyn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Theskyn''' was the court mage of [[Athalantar]] and an old friend and trusted servant of the Stag King [[Uthgrael Aumar]].

He tutored prince [[Cauln Aumar]] and many magelings sent to [[Hastarl]] by the outlying knights of the realm. He died soon after Uthgrael in [[217 DR]], poisoned by [[Belaur Aumar]]'s agents.
